skills.name: Vampire Bat
skills.description: Attacks 2 times with a vampire bat and recovers HP by 30% of the inflicted damage.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, weakening its Attack Power and decreasing its Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 75% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skills.name: Feast of Blood (Passive)
skills.description: Attacks leave a Branding Effect that lasts for 2 turns, and heal all allies for 30% of the damage done. Also, whenever you kill an enemy, the attack bar of all allies increase by 30%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
